attachments.fallback:
<https://twitter.com/TeejDeVries|@TeejDeVries>: Really excited about working on this PR to add <https://twitter.com/luarocksorg|@luarocksorg> support to packer.nvim (package manager written in Lua for Neovim) :<https://github.com/wbthomason/packer.nvim/pull/24>

Once we finish this, we hope to add `.rockspec` support for packages, to bring the integrate the lua ecosystem into #neovim.
attachments.text:
Really excited about working on this PR to add <https://twitter.com/luarocksorg|@luarocksorg> support to packer.nvim (package manager written in Lua for Neovim) :<https://github.com/wbthomason/packer.nvim/pull/24>

Once we finish this, we hope to add `.rockspec` support for packages, to bring the integrate the lua ecosystem into #neovim.
